item.title: By: BigJim
item.dc:creator: BigJim
item.description:
www.shippingsidekick.com
It will tell you which shipper to use as usually one is much cheaper than the others. DHL seems to usually be the cheapest, but many people don't know about them (the big yellow trucks).
Hope this helps
Big Jim
item.content:encoded:
http://www.shippingsidekick.com/

It will tell you which shipper to use as usually one is much cheaper than the others. DHL seems to usually be the cheapest, but many people don’t know about them (the big yellow trucks).

Hope this helps

Big Jim
